p: The seven inhibitors were analyzed for their drug likeliness and pharmacokinetic properties such as ADME/T (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Elimination or Toxicity) (Butina et al., 2002). The QikProp module implemented in the ‘Schrodinger Suite 2019’ was used to estimate the drug likeliness of the inhibitors using pharmacokinetic parameters such as probable H-bonding atoms, human oral absorption (<25%: poor; >above 80%: good) and the IC 50 values for blockage of human Ether-a-go-go-Related Gene (hERG) K + channels(< −5: satisfactory) and Lipinski’s rule of five (Lipinski, 2004).
